description_html:
The Seri stool is the latest piece in the of the Seri collection. The first of the Seri objects were presented in 2014 and designed by Garth Roberts the collection features a texture which echoes the deep gouges often found in the artistry of African tribal mask work and other traditional textured woodcraft objects.

The solid wood Seri stool design is highlighted by an asymmetric leg configuration and a circular seat.
Both the seat and legs of the stool, as all Seri collection objects, are embellished with the intricate Seri texture edge banding which is expertly crafted by Mabeo's craftsmen and women in Botswana.

Material: Panga Panga Wood

Size (mm): 350 dia x 423 h
